name: mycred-gb-blocks/mycred-video
title: Video
description: A block to embed a video and award points based on specific logic (e.g., watching the video, watching full video, etc.).

width.description: The width of the video iframe.

height.description: The height of the video iframe.

ctype.description: The point type associated with this video.

amount.description: The amount of points to award for watching the video.

interval.description: The interval in seconds for awarding points (only used with 'interval' logic).
